Name: Ballade of Endless Woe
Notes: This music is based upon a poem by the Tang dynasty poet Po Chü-Yi about the tragic love between the beautiful Yang Kwei-Fei (originally a poor peasant girl) and Ming Huang, the emperor during the Tang Dynasty.
Long Description: The music refers to the poem of the same name by Po Chü-Yi, a poet of the Tang Dynasty, about the tragic love between the beautiful Yang Kwei-Fei (originally a poor peasant girl) and Ming Huang, the ruler of the Tang Dynasty.
Short Description: A composition for vocal quartet and piano based on a Tang dynasty poem.
